function.name: add
function.description: Add a list of numbers.

values.description: A list of numbers to add.

function.name: count
function.description: Count the number of non-None elements in a list.

values.description: A list of values to count.

function.name: divide
function.description: Divide two numbers.

function.name: greater_than
function.description: Check if value_a is greater than value_b.

function.name: index
function.description: Return the 0-based index of query_value in values.

query_value.description: The value to find the index for.

function.name: less_than
function.description: Check if value_a is less than value_b.

function.name: maximum
function.description: Return the maximum of a list of numbers.

values.description: A list of numbers to Return the maximum for.

function.name: mean
function.description: Calculate the mean of a list of numbers.

values.description: A list of numbers to calculate the mean for.

function.name: minimum
function.description: Return the minimum of a list of numbers.

values.description: A list of numbers to Return the minimum for.

function.name: multiply
function.description: Multiply a list of numbers.

values.description: A list of numbers to multiply.

function.name: rank
function.description: Return the 1-based rank of query_value in values sorted descending.

values.description: A list of numbers to rank against.

query_value.description: The value whose rank is to be determined.

function.name: sort
function.description: Sort a list of numbers.

values.description: The list of numbers to sort.

function.name: subtract
function.description: Subtract value_b from value_a.

function.name: get_country_code_from_name
function.description: Get the three-letter country code from a country name.

country_name.description: The name of the country to get the code for.

function.name: get_country_codes_in_region
function.description: Get the list of country codes in a given region.

region.description: The region to get the countries for.

function.name: get_country_name_from_code
function.description: Get the country name from a three-letter country code.

country_code.description: The three-letter country code to get the name for.

function.name: get_indicator_code_from_name
function.description: Get the indicator code from an indicator name.

indicator_name.description: The name of the indicator to get the code for.

function.name: get_indicator_name_from_code
function.description: Get the indicator name from an indicator code.

indicator_code.description: The code of the indicator to get the name for.

function.name: retrieve_value
function.description: Return the value of an indicator for a country at a given year.

country_code.description: The three-letter country code to look up the indicator for.

indicator_code.description: The indicator code to look up.

year.description: The year to look up the indicator for.

function.name: search_for_indicator_names
function.description: Retrieve indicator names and descriptions that match the given keywords.

keywords.description: A list of keywords or a string to search for.

function.name: final_answer
function.description: Submit your final answer.

function.name: think
function.description: Record a thought or plan for the next step.

thought.description: A string describing your plan or reasoning.
